price: Kuma mẽne ne a kansu, idan sun yi ĩmãni da Allah, kumada Rãnar Lãhira, kuma sun ciyar da abin da Allah Yã azurtã su, kuma Allah Ya kasance, gare su, Masani?
arabic: وَمَاذَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمۡ عَلِيمًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamādhā ʿalayhim law āmanū bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-anfaqū mimmā razaqahumu al-lahu wakāna al-lahu bihim ʿalīman
